participants.name:

(Sara Taylor)
participants.description: Former Owner/Artist/Entertainer at A Funky Affair Entertainment

messages.message:
Brian
Your family is in my prayers.

Brian
We should meet up soon, I can make time any day.
I would like that. Not sure when things might die down enough but I will be at the hospital tomorrow.

Brian
 We are here for you if you need us, see you soon.
Thank you very much your mom was wonderful today give her another hug for me please.
Hey man!  I heard the news, Congrats!

Brian
Thank you!  It was a small group, we will throw a big party closer to our ceremony in Italy.
I'm still figuring out when I will throw my party from my wedding in January. I don't have any money.
